      • newShipping

        public static Shipping newShipping(java.math.BigDecimal shippingCost)
        Create a Shipping object with the given shipping cost.
        Parameters:
        shippingCost - Cost in units of the Merchant's default currency
        Returns:

      • newShipping

        public static Shipping newShipping(java.math.BigDecimal shippingCost,
                   TaxRate taxRate)
        Create a Shipping object with the given cost, taxRate, and taxName
        Parameters:
        shippingCost - Cost in units of the Merchant's default currency
        taxRate - A TaxRate object indicating the tax rate for shipping.
        Returns:
        An object that implements the Shipping interface. Returns null if the taxRate doesn't have a name.

      • newInvoiceItem

        public static InvoiceItem newInvoiceItem(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String appSpecificInventoryId,
                         java.math.BigDecimal price,
                         TaxRate taxRate)
        Create a CartItem with the specified values.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the CartItem
        appSpecificInventoryId - An inventory Id of your choosing. Perhaps use it to match this item to items in your inventory system.
        price - The price of the CartItem
        taxRate - The tax rate to use for this item for a given purchase.
